headline: Warren Buffett Owns 1 Telecom Giant. Why That Stock Should Continue to Soar.
summary: Throughout Warren Buffett's investment history, Berkshire Hathaway's investment portfolio has included all three major U.S. telecom companies.  Dividend payments, a steady stream of revenue, and a reasonable valuation could have been reasons that Buffett's took an interest in these stocks.  Today, Berkshire only holds one telecom stock in its portfolio.

headline: T-Mobile Or Deutsche Telekom: Which Stock Is The Better Buy?
summary: Deutsche Telekom owns over half of T-Mobile, with the U.S. unit driving profits. Learn why TMUS and DTEGY stocks have distinct dynamics and valuations.
